      • deactivate

        public void deactivate(java.net.URI id)
        Deactivates a network by ID.

        API Call: POST /vdc/networks/{id}/deactivate?force=false

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the network to deactivate.

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate(java.net.URI id,
              boolean force)
        Deactivates a network by ID.

        API Call: POST /vdc/networks/{id}/deactivate?force={force}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the network to deactivate.
        force - if true, will delete manually created network.
